name: wid5_F2F3_module17
label: F2F 3: PAPI children (PAPI)
description: This questionnaire module contains questions on: cultural capital: reading, classical music, cultural discussion, cultural participation; depression screening; fear of failure; global life satisfaction; narcissism; patience; perceived self-efficacy; personality measures (BIG5); physical activies; political activity, political interest, party identification; risk aversion; self esteem; smartphone-use; social capital of individuals, e.g., close friends, frequency of social contacts, loneliness; worrying.

per0200.question: per0200
per0200.name: per0200
per0200.label: Would you describe yourself as someone who is willing to take risks or as someone who tries to avoid risks? In other words, do you often try things that could go wrong, or do you prefer to play it safe? The value 1 means: Not at all willing to take risks, the value 11 means: Very willing to take risks. With the values in between you can grade your assessment.
per0200.label_de: [IF age < 17] Wie schaetzt Du Dich ein? Bist Du im Allgemeinen ein risikobereiter Mensch oder versuchst Du, Risiken zu vermeiden? Das heisst, unternimmst Du haeufig Dinge, die moeglicherweise schiefgehen koennen, oder versuchst Du eher auf Nummer sicher zu gehen? Der Wert 1 bedeutet Gar nicht risikobereit, der Wert 11 bedeutet: Sehr risikobereit. Mit den Werten dazwischen kannst Du Deine Einschaetzung abstufen.

items.text: Would you describe yourself as someone who is willing to take risks or as someone who tries to avoid risks? In other words, do you often try things that could go wrong, or do you prefer to play it safe? The value 1 means: Not at all willing to take risks, the value 11 means: Very willing to take risks. With the values in between you can grade your assessment.
items.text_de: [IF age < 17] Wie schaetzt Du Dich ein? Bist Du im Allgemeinen ein risikobereiter Mensch oder versuchst Du, Risiken zu vermeiden? items.description: Source: The German Socio-Economic Panel Study (SOEP): SOEP Core Study Individual 2008
items.description_de: Source: Sozio-oekonomisches Panel (SOEP): SOEP Personenfragebogen 2008

answers.label: 0: not at all prepared to take risks

fof0100.label: Sometimes things in life don't go smoothly. Something you set out to do didn't work out. In the following, we want to learn how you deal with such setbacks.
fof0100.label_de: [IF age < 17 ] Manchmal laufen die Dinge im Leben nicht rund. Etwas, das man sich vorgenommen hat, hat nicht funktioniert. Im Folgenden wollen wir erfahren, wie Du mit solchen Rueckschlaegen umgehst.

items.text: Sometimes things in life don't go smoothly. Something you set out to do didn't work out. In the following, we want to learn how you deal with such setbacks.

items.text_de: Wenn ich versage, fuerchte ich, dass ich nicht genug Talent habe.
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Conroy, D. E., Willow, J. P., & Metzler, J. N. (2002). Multidimensional fear of failure measurement: The Performance Failure Appraisal Inventory. Journal of Applied Sport Psychology, 14, 76-90
items.description_de: Source: Adaptiert von: Conroy, D. E., Willow, J. P., & Metzler, J. N. (2002). Multidimensional fear of failure measurement: The Performance Failure Appraisal Inventory. Journal of Applied Sport Psychology, 14, 76-90

items.text: When I am failing, it upsets my 'plan' for the future.
items.text_de: Wenn ich versage, wirft es meinen Plan fuer die Zukunft um.
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Conroy, D. E., Willow, J. P., & Metzler, J. N. (2002). Multidimensional fear of failure measurement: The Performance Failure Appraisal Inventory. Journal of Applied Sport Psychology, 14, 76-90
items.description_de: Source: Adaptiert von: Conroy, D. E., Willow, J. P., & Metzler, J. N. (2002). Multidimensional fear of failure measurement: The Performance Failure Appraisal Inventory. Journal of Applied Sport Psychology, 14, 76-90

items.text: When I am not succeeding, people are less interested in me.
items.text_de: Wenn ich nicht erfolgreich bin, interessieren sich Andere weniger fuer mich.
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Conroy, D. E., Willow, J. P., & Metzler, J. N. (2002). Multidimensional fear of failure measurement: The Performance Failure Appraisal Inventory. Journal of Applied Sport Psychology, 14, 76-90
items.description_de: Source: Adaptiert von: Conroy, D. E., Willow, J. P., & Metzler, J. N. (2002). Multidimensional fear of failure measurement: The Performance Failure Appraisal Inventory. Journal of Applied Sport Psychology, 14, 76-90

items.text: When I am failing, important others are disappointed.
items.text_de: Wenn ich versage, sind wichtige Personen enttaeuscht.
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Conroy, D. E., Willow, J. P., & Metzler, J. N. (2002). Multidimensional fear of failure measurement: The Performance Failure Appraisal Inventory. Journal of Applied Sport Psychology, 14, 76-90
items.description_de: Source: Adaptiert von: Conroy, D. E., Willow, J. P., & Metzler, J. N. (2002). Multidimensional fear of failure measurement: The Performance Failure Appraisal Inventory. Journal of Applied Sport Psychology, 14, 76-90

ses0100.question: ses0100
ses0100.name: ses0100
ses0100.label: In the following, a number of statements will be presented. To what extent do you agree with these statements?
ses0100.label_de: [IF age < 17 ] Wie sehr stimmst Du den folgenden Aussagen zu?

items.text: In the following, a number of statements will be presented. To what extent do you agree with these statements?
items.text_de: [IF age < 17 ] Wie sehr stimmst Du den folgenden Aussagen zu?
items.description: Source: Thoennissen, C., Wilhelm B., Friedrich, S., Alt, P., & Walper S. (2014). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 6
items.description_de: Source: Thoennissen, C., Wilhelm B., Friedrich, S., Alt, P., & Walper S. (2014). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 6

items.text: At times I think that I am no good at all.
items.text_de: Manchmal denke ich, dass ich wertlos bin.
items.description: Source: Thoennissen, C., Wilhelm B., Friedrich, S., Alt, P., & Walper S. (2014). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 6
items.description_de: Source: Thoennissen, C., Wilhelm B., Friedrich, S., Alt, P., & Walper S. (2014). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 6

items.text: I take a positive attitude toward myself.
items.text_de: Ich mag mich so, wie ich bin.
items.description: Source: Thoennissen, C., Wilhelm B., Friedrich, S., Alt, P., & Walper S. (2014). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 6
items.description_de: Source: Thoennissen, C., Wilhelm B., Friedrich, S., Alt, P., & Walper S. (2014). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 6

items.text: On the whole, I am satisfied with myself.
items.text_de: Alles in allem bin ich mit mir selbst zufrieden.
items.description: Source: Thoennissen, C., Wilhelm B., Friedrich, S., Alt, P., & Walper S. (2014). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 6
items.description_de: Source: Thoennissen, C., Wilhelm B., Friedrich, S., Alt, P., & Walper S. (2014). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 6

sef0100.question: sef0100
sef0100.name: sef0100
sef0100.label: Sometimes people doubt their own abilities in difficult situations. In the following, we would like to know how you cope with difficult situations. How much do you agree with the following statements?
sef0100.label_de: [IF age < 17 ] Manchmal zweifelt man in schwierigen Situationen an den eigenen Faehigkeiten. Im Folgenden wuerden wir gerne wissen, wie Du mit schwierigen Situationen zurecht kommst. Wie sehr stimmst Du den folgenden Aussagen zu?

items.text: Sometimes people doubt their own abilities in difficult situations. In the following, we would like to know how you cope with difficult situations. How much do you agree with the following statements?
items.text_de: [IF age < 17 ] Manchmal zweifelt man in schwierigen Situationen an den eigenen Faehigkeiten. Im Folgenden wuerden wir gerne wissen, wie Du mit schwierigen Situationen zurecht kommst. Wie sehr stimmst Du den folgenden Aussagen zu?
items.description: Source: Beierlein, C., Kovaleva, A., Kemper, C. J., & Rammstedt, B. (2012). Ein Messinstrument zur Erfassung subjektiver Kompetenzerwartungen. Allgemeine Selbstwirksamkeit Kurzskala (ASKU). GESIS Working Paper. Koeln: GESIS
items.description_de: Source: Beierlein, C., Kovaleva, A., Kemper, C. J., & Rammstedt, B. (2012). Ein Messinstrument zur Erfassung subjektiver Kompetenzerwartungen. Allgemeine Selbstwirksamkeit Kurzskala (ASKU). GESIS Working Paper. Koeln: GESIS

items.text: I can rely on my own abilities in difficult situations.
items.text_de: In schwierigen Situationen kann ich mich auf meine Faehigkeiten verlassen.
items.description: Source: Beierlein, C., Kovaleva, A., Kemper, C. J., & Rammstedt, B. (2012). Ein Messinstrument zur Erfassung subjektiver Kompetenzerwartungen. Allgemeine Selbstwirksamkeit Kurzskala (ASKU). GESIS Working Paper. Koeln: GESIS
items.description_de: Source: Beierlein, C., Kovaleva, A., Kemper, C. J., & Rammstedt, B. (2012). Ein Messinstrument zur Erfassung subjektiver Kompetenzerwartungen. Allgemeine Selbstwirksamkeit Kurzskala (ASKU). GESIS Working Paper. Koeln: GESIS

items.text: I am able to solve most problems on my own.
items.text_de: Die meisten Probleme kann ich aus eigener Kraft gut meistern.
items.description: Source: Beierlein, C., Kovaleva, A., Kemper, C. J., & Rammstedt, B. (2012). Ein Messinstrument zur Erfassung subjektiver Kompetenzerwartungen. Allgemeine Selbstwirksamkeit Kurzskala (ASKU). GESIS Working Paper. Koeln: GESIS
items.description_de: Source: Beierlein, C., Kovaleva, A., Kemper, C. J., & Rammstedt, B. (2012). Ein Messinstrument zur Erfassung subjektiver Kompetenzerwartungen. Allgemeine Selbstwirksamkeit Kurzskala (ASKU). GESIS Working Paper. Koeln: GESIS

items.text: I can usually solve even challenging and complex tasks well.
items.text_de: Auch anstrengende und komplizierte Aufgaben kann ich in der Regel gut loesen.
items.description: Source: Beierlein, C., Kovaleva, A., Kemper, C. J., & Rammstedt, B. (2012). Ein Messinstrument zur Erfassung subjektiver Kompetenzerwartungen. Allgemeine Selbstwirksamkeit Kurzskala (ASKU). GESIS Working Paper. Koeln: GESIS
items.description_de: Source: Beierlein, C., Kovaleva, A., Kemper, C. J., & Rammstedt, B. (2012). Ein Messinstrument zur Erfassung subjektiver Kompetenzerwartungen. Allgemeine Selbstwirksamkeit Kurzskala (ASKU). GESIS Working Paper. Koeln: GESIS

gls0600.question: gls0600
gls0600.name: gls0600
gls0600.label: Finally, we would like to know how satisfied you are with your life in general. How much do you agree with the following statements?
gls0600.label_de: [IF age < 17 ] Zuletzt wuerden wir gerne wissen, wie zufrieden Du ganz allgemein mit Deinem Leben bist. Wie sehr stimmst Du den folgenden Aussagen zu?

items.text: Finally, we would like to know how satisfied you are with your life in general. How much do you agree with the following statements?
items.text_de: [IF age < 17 ] Zuletzt wuerden wir gerne wissen, wie zufrieden Du ganz allgemein mit Deinem Leben bist. Wie sehr stimmst Du den folgenden Aussagen zu?
items.description: Source: Satisfaction with Life Scale adapted for Children; Gadermann, A. M., Schonert-Reichl, K. A., & Zumbo, B. D. (2010). Investigating validity evidence of the Satisfaction with Life Scale adapted for children. Social Indicators Research, 96, 229-247
items.description_de: Source: Satisfaction with Life Scale adapted for Children; Gadermann, A. M., Schonert-Reichl, K. A., & Zumbo, B. D. (2010). Investigating validity evidence of the Satisfaction with Life Scale adapted for children. Social Indicators Research, 96, 229-247

items.text: In most ways, my life is close to the way I would want it to be.
items.text_de: Im Grossen und Ganzen ist mein Leben so wie ich es mir wuensche.
items.description: Source: Satisfaction with Life Scale adapted for Children; Gadermann, A. M., Schonert-Reichl, K. A., & Zumbo, B. D. (2010). Investigating validity evidence of the Satisfaction with Life Scale adapted for children. Social Indicators Research, 96, 229-247
items.description_de: Source: Satisfaction with Life Scale adapted for Children; Gadermann, A. M., Schonert-Reichl, K. A., & Zumbo, B. D. (2010). Investigating validity evidence of the Satisfaction with Life Scale adapted for children. Social Indicators Research, 96, 229-247

items.text: The things in my life are excellent.
items.text_de: Mein Leben ist grossartig.
items.description: Source: Satisfaction with Life Scale adapted for Children; Gadermann, A. M., Schonert-Reichl, K. A., & Zumbo, B. D. (2010). Investigating validity evidence of the Satisfaction with Life Scale adapted for children. Social Indicators Research, 96, 229-247
items.description_de: Source: Satisfaction with Life Scale adapted for Children; Gadermann, A. M., Schonert-Reichl, K. A., & Zumbo, B. D. (2010). Investigating validity evidence of the Satisfaction with Life Scale adapted for children. Social Indicators Research, 96, 229-247

items.text: I am happy with my life.
items.text_de: Ich bin mit meinem Leben gluecklich.
items.description: Source: Satisfaction with Life Scale adapted for Children; Gadermann, A. M., Schonert-Reichl, K. A., & Zumbo, B. D. (2010). Investigating validity evidence of the Satisfaction with Life Scale adapted for children. Social Indicators Research, 96, 229-247
items.description_de: Source: Satisfaction with Life Scale adapted for Children; Gadermann, A. M., Schonert-Reichl, K. A., & Zumbo, B. D. (2010). Investigating validity evidence of the Satisfaction with Life Scale adapted for children. Social Indicators Research, 96, 229-247

items.text: So far, I have gotten the important things I want in life.
items.text_de: Ich habe bisher die wichtigen Dinge, die ich mir vom Leben wuensche, auch bekommen.
items.description: Source: Satisfaction with Life Scale adapted for Children; Gadermann, A. M., Schonert-Reichl, K. A., & Zumbo, B. D. (2010). Investigating validity evidence of the Satisfaction with Life Scale adapted for children. Social Indicators Research, 96, 229-247
items.description_de: Source: Satisfaction with Life Scale adapted for Children; Gadermann, A. M., Schonert-Reichl, K. A., & Zumbo, B. D. (2010). Investigating validity evidence of the Satisfaction with Life Scale adapted for children. Social Indicators Research, 96, 229-247

items.text: If I could live my life over, I would have it the same way.
items.text_de: Wenn ich mein Leben noch einmal leben koennte, wuerde ich es mir genauso wuenschen.
items.description: Source: Satisfaction with Life Scale adapted for Children; Gadermann, A. M., Schonert-Reichl, K. A., & Zumbo, B. D. (2010). Investigating validity evidence of the Satisfaction with Life Scale adapted for children. Social Indicators Research, 96, 229-247
